channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dad who woke up from coma after car crash thought it was 1980
item.description: After he was hit by a car and left in a coma in 2019, Luciano D'Adamo woke up believing the year was 1980

item.title: Woman finds strange metal rod baked into her Pizza Hut takeaway
item.description: The fast food giant refused to give her a refund.

item.title: UK to be hotter than parts of Spain as weather forecast says mercury to rocket
item.description: The Met Office said it was 17C on Wednesday in Llysdinam, Powys, and this warm trend is set to continue for some time yet as meteorologists give their...

item.title: Dancer leaves everyone floored with optical illusion nobody can agree on
item.description: The direction of the ballerinas' pirouettes has caused a major debate because nobody can agree on which way one of the dancers is turning, with some c...

item.title: Mystery footprints appear at coffee shop ‘haunted by soldier from 1800s’
item.description: 'Within the first week of the shop, I kept hearing the sound of rustling noises in the office.'

item.title: Greggs loving runner completes marathon while eating at 29 bakeries
item.description: A runner loves Greggs so much he built it into his marathon training regime.

item.title: Only those with the sharpest minds can solve this Halloween brainteaser in 15 seconds
item.description: Brainteasers are a great way of keeping your mind sharp. This Halloween brainteaser from Thortful asks you to find the orange in a sea of pumpkins and...

item.title: Pensioner 'afraid of thieves' throws out old mattress - but it had £41,000 life savings in it

item.title: Fight erupts on BA plane at Heathrow over a Donald Trump MAGA hat
item.description: The pair came to blows over the slogan on the front of the cap.

item.title: Girl rioter, 16, hurled rocks at police to try to impress boy she fancied
